name: Gaslighting
description:
"She could smell gas even before she opened the door to her apartment." This is a short story about how Zacharia and her roommates, Zacc and Zachy, and how they must come together to figure out who left the gas running. Was it a jealous ex-boyfriend or was it a disgruntled roommate? The only way to know for sure is to play the game.

Game created with RenPy for UCSC's Games and Playable Media Master's program (Class: Game Technologies). All credits for the art, music, and sound effects are in the about section of the main menu.
